          <title>
            <string language="en">Seasonal variation in tropospheric ozone in the Northern Hemisphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saisonschwankung im troposphärischen Ozon in der
Nordhemisphäre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Variation saisonnière de l'ozone troposphérique
dans l'hémisphère nordique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Variação seasonal no ozônio tropospheric no 
hemisfério do norte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Variazione stagionale in ozono tropospheric 
nell'emisfero nordico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εποχιακή παραλλαγή στο τροποσφαιρικό όζον στο βόρειο 
ημισφαίριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Variación estacional en ozono tropospheric en el
hemisferio norteño</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph illustrates the seasonal variation in tropospheric ozone in the Northern Hemisphere.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres illustre la variation
